1601640.name: At The Party - Suspect Sketch
1601640.description:
Take on the role of sketch artists, working under pressure to try and get the essense of a hardened criminal onto your canvas.

The witness might not be very clear, but your job is to make sure your sketch is! Whoever can really capture the spirit will win out, and nab the villain.

Play with friends in person or remotely! Play this game and others in At The Party, have a laugh, and hang out.

You can invite up to 16 friends to play with you! Just send them a link and they can join on their phone, or any device with a modern web browser. Start up At The Party, jump into a party with friends, and you can play this and any other game DLC that anyone in the party owns.

If you are all in the same room, you can set up a TV, laptop or other screen for everyone to see as well. If you are in separate places, don't worry, you don't need to stream the game (but you can if you want!)—anyone can load up their own spectator view, or just play using only one screen.

You can play directly on Steam, but also through the website, so you can easily play from your phone or any other device with a modern web browser. If you play on the web, remember to sign in with Steam to access the game!
1601640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
